info.name: dubtrack.fm - Better player header
info.description: Calms the madness that are the buttons above the main player.
info.additionalInfo: Introduction These buttons really do suck. Mod buttons do not match exactly, making them match sucked a whole lot and the end result turned out a fair bit underwhelming. Nonetheless, everything looks near-about perfect with this style. This modifies how the gear icon for room settings is displayed, and makes the left-side buttons match the skip button on the right. Room settings button will inherit whatever color is set for .player_header SPAN. Bugs I'm forced to keep the gear icon used for room settings small, lest I make the button too big compared to the other buttons. Sorry about that. GitHub release For integration into your community's theme, you can get it here. Updates 12/27/15 They fixed the skip button. That's one less thing I have to worry about.
